attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Withdraw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Flame Charge
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Razor Shell
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Psy Bolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Hone Claws
attacks.effect:
During your next turn, each of this Pokémon’s attacks does 30 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Fighting

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent’s hand.

attacks.name: Metal Sound
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dual Chop
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
